id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually set the ID of this touchscreen.

*See also: [FT5X06 Touch Screen Controller](https://esphome.io/components/touchscreen/ft5x06.html#configuration-variables)*

interrupt_pin.docs:
**, [Pin Schema](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin-schema)**: The GPIO pin to use as the interrupt pin. This pin is used to detect when the touchscreen has new data available. If not set, the touchscreen will be polled instead of using interrupts.

*See also: [FT5X06 Touch Screen Controller](https://esphome.io/components/touchscreen/ft5x06.html#configuration-variables)*

rotation.docs:
Set the rotation of the touchscreen. By default this will be set to match the display associated with the touchscreen, but this allows more control. Choices are `0`, `90`, `180` and `270`.

*See also: [FT5X06 Touch Screen Controller](https://esphome.io/components/touchscreen/ft5x06.html#configuration-variables)*
